titleStmt.title: H. Edminson et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5643

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: The undersigned who are the neighbors & intimate acquaintancs of R Thomas Powell & who are also citizens of Scott County ^Kentucky^ would most earnestly & respectfully request His Excellency Gov Bramblett to remit such ^as may be under his control^ of the judgment of the Scott Circuit Court against said R Thomas Powell in the case of the Commonwealth vs James Powell jr rendered at its May term 1864 said judgment being upon a forfeited bail bond given by said James Powell jr with said R Thomas Powell as his surety -- said James Powell had no property at the time he gave said bond & has now none & we are well satisfied that said James Powells absence from court was not by the approbation or consent or connivance of said R Thomas Powell

H Edmindson
G. W. Robertson
William Fish
Jesse Jones
S. W. H. Rawlins
Edward Warring
Jas M Warring
Geo W Warring
J. T. Power
John H Offutt
Ald Morgan
Calvin Tingle
Thomas Hedger
Henry C Beaver
B. G. Atkins
E. Edmondson
John Maddox
J J Rogers
Gano Whalton
Henry B Griffith
W H Daugherty
James Humphrey
G. Fink
J. A. Noel
G. G. Noel
Thomas Risk
Robt Thompson
S. M. Berry
W. H. Offutt
C. D. Smith
E D Hastings
J. G Morrison Pr J S C
Robt P. Snell
David Emison
Hiram Wood
S. G. Keene
James Pullen
Thomas Neale
A W Forwood
W. F. Pullen
John Akill
George S. Hensley
Thos. Marksell
T. N. Finnell
